# ==(_:_:)

**Operator**

Indicates whether two entities are equal.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated static func == (lhs: Entity, rhs: Entity) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **lhs**: The first entity to compare.
- **rhs**: The second entity to compare.

## Return Value

A Boolean value set to `true` if the two entities are equal.

## Comparing entities

- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of the entity by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.description: Hashes the essential components of the entity by feeding them into the given hash function.
items.name: hash(into:)
